tests.name: Task 1 Collatz sequence
tests.setup: sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install -y r-base-core r-cran-tidyverse r-cran-testthat
tests.run: Rscript -e 'library(testthat); suppressPackageStartupMessages(source("01-gen_collatz.R")); test_file("tests/testthat/test-1) Collatz sequence.R", reporter = ProgressReporter, stop_on_failure = TRUE)'

tests.name: Task 1 Validity checks
tests.run: Rscript -e 'library(testthat); suppressPackageStartupMessages(source("01-gen_collatz.R"); source("02-eda.R")); test_file("tests/testthat/test-4) Backtracking data frame.R", reporter = ProgressReporter, stop_on_failure = TRUE)'

tests.name: Task 2 Exploratory dataanalysis
tests.run: Rscript -e 'library(testthat); suppressPackageStartupMessages(source("02-eda.R")); test_file("tests/testthat/test-3) Data wrangling tasks.R", reporter = ProgressReporter, stop_on_failure = TRUE)'

tests.name: Task 3 Backtracking data frame
tests.run: Rscript -e 'library(testthat); suppressPackageStartupMessages(source("03-backtracking.R")); test_file("tests/testthat/test-4) Backtracking data frame.R", reporter = ProgressReporter, stop_on_failure = TRUE)'

tests.name: Task 3 Backtracking tasks
tests.run: Rscript -e 'library(testthat); test_file("tests/testthat/test-5) Backtracking tasks.R", reporter = ProgressReporter, stop_on_failure = TRUE)'
